mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller ( business_license_number, business_name, tel, owner_name, email, business_account, private_business, zip_code, address, address_detail, seller_img, member_id ) VALUES ( #{businessLicenseNumber}, #{businessName}, #{tel}, #{ownerName}, #{email}, #{businessAccount}, #{privateBusiness}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{sellerImg}, #{memberId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE seller SET business_license_number = IFNULL( #{businessLicenseNumber}, business_license_number ), business_name = IFNULL( #{businessName}, business_name ), tel = IFNULL( #{tel}, tel ), owner_name = IFNULL( #{ownerName}, owner_name ), email = IFNULL( #{email}, email ), business_account = IFNULL( #{businessAccount}, business_account ), private_business = IFNULL( #{privateBusiness}, private_business ), zip_code = IFNULL( #{zipCode}, zip_code ), address = IFNULL( #{address}, address ), address_detail = IFNULL( #{addressDetail}, address_detail ), seller_img = IFNULL( #{sellerImg}, seller_img ), member_id = IFNULL( #{memberId}, member_id ), updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}
